items.title: PANW, AVGO, FTNT, CHKP Stocks Decline Pre-Market As China Reportedly Bans Cybersecurity Software From US, Israeli Firms
items.description: Chinese authorities have instructed domestic companies not to use cybersecurity software from the banned companies, citing national security concerns.

items.title: Tom Lee-Backed BMNR Stakes Over A Quarter Of Its Ethereum Treasury Ahead Of Shareholder Vote
items.description: Bitmine shareholders are scheduled to vote on the company’s proposal to increase authorized shares from 500 million to 50 billion on Thursday.

items.title: Tesla Stock Falls Premarket: Elon Musk Says FSD Will Go Subscription-Only From Valentine's Day
items.description: Tesla currently offers FSD on a monthly subscription and a one-time fee of $8,000.

items.title: Visa Teams Up With BVNK To Enable Stablecoin Payments Amid Washington’s Push For Clarity
items.description: Visa partnered with BVNK to enable stablecoin payments on Visa Direct, as U.S. regulation advances and institutional adoption grows.

items.title: DAL Stock Eyes Third Day In The Red Even As Retail Traders Shrug Off Softer Outlook
items.description: Delta Air Lines’ Q4 results, however, beat expectations, as premium offerings remain customer favourites.
